column2: Rena, 65-74 Female  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: I have been taking this drug for years.Did ok for my BP.After all those years I started getting a bed swelling and gradually wounds of my lips.Eight doctors including a lip biopsy coud not find the reason for it.On my own, I stopped the Valsartan and the condition cleared after long months of suffering. I started to take it again and now two years later I received the bad symptoms again.I will stop it now, and see that my doctor  will give me another BP medicine.
